roleset.name: believe, view, hold as true
roleset.note: CONSIDER-V NOTES: Member of VNcls consider-29.9-1-1-1. (from consider.01-v)

example.name: consider-v: active
example.text: Economists consider that a sign that inflationary pressures are abating.
example.arg: that a sign that inflationary pressures are abating

example.name: consider-v: passivized
example.text: [Shorter maturities]-1 are considered *trace*-1 a sign of rising rates because portfolio managers can capture higher rates sooner.
example.arg: because portfolio managers can capture higher rates sooner.

roleset.name: contemplate an action, possibility, appointment, proposition, etc
roleset.note: CONSIDER-V NOTES: Adjectival 'considered' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls consider-29.9-1-1-1 (from consider.02-v)
CONSIDERATION-N NOTES: Corresponds to consider.02. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from consideration.01-n)
CONSIDERED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from considered.02-j)

example.name: consider-v: PP
example.text: [David Dinkins]-1 was being considered *trace*-1 for a city job.

example.name: consider-v: gerund
example.text: Commonwealth Edison is considering *trace* appealing Judge Curry's order.

example.name: consider-v: as-phrase
example.text: ...to encourage good students to consider teaching as a career.

example.name: considered-j
example.text: The newspaper remarked that Kawamura Takayuki kept emphasizing that his thoughts had been ill - considered with regard to an important issue like the Nanjing Massacre , " Unlike the relations between two governments , non-governmental exchanges are extremely important in improving the trust between the people of these two countries . Kawamura 's statement , no matter as a politician or as a mayor , was improper . "
example.arg: with regard to an important issue like the Nanjing Massacre

example.name: consideration-n: All args
example.text: Dana's consideration of the application for the management position depended on a number of factors.
